query: SELECT analysis.id AS analysis_id FROM analysis INNER JOIN info ON analysis.id = info.id WHERE info.id_type = 'Analysis';

SELECT analysis.id AS analysis_id , info.info AS info FROM analysis INNER JOIN info ON analysis.id = info.id WHERE info.id_type = 'Analysis' AND info.info->>'key1' ~ '.*value1$' AND info.info->'key2'->'key3'->>'key4' ~ '.*value2\d+';
SELECT analysis.id AS analysis_id , info.info AS info FROM analysis INNER JOIN info ON analysis.id = info.id WHERE info.id_type = 'Analysis';

SELECT analysis.id AS analysis_id FROM analysis INNER JOIN info ON analysis.id = info.id WHERE info.id_type = 'Analysis' AND info.info->>'key1' ~ '.*value1$' AND info.info->'key2'->'key3'->>'key4' ~ '.*value2\d+';
